perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, ebix desires to receive promotions on the About Network for the parties' Insurance Center and for the ebix Site (hereinafter defined).
NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the agreements and obligations set forth
herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
sufficiency of such is hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto hereby agree as
follows:
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, ebix desires to receive promotions on the About Network for the parties' Insurance Center and for the ebix Online Platform (hereinafter defined).
NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the agreements and obligations set forth
herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
sufficiency of such is hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto hereby agree as
follows:
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'ebix Site' to 'ebix Online Platform' introduces ambiguity. It is unclear if 'ebix Site' and 'ebix Online Platform' refer to the exact same entity. If not, the specific promotional obligations become confusing.

perturbation.original_text:
Customers, including but not limited to: (i) internet addresses and
      navigational information, including information disclosing the usage of
      Links within or available through the Insurance Channel余 (ii)
      transactional information, including, but not limited to, names,
      addresses, billing information, information requested余 and (iii) any other
      information that identifies an individual as an About Customer.
perturbation.changed_text:
Customers, including but not limited to: (i) internet addresses and
      navigational information, including information disclosing the usage of
      Links within or available through the Insurance Channel余 (ii)
      transactional information, including, but not limited to, names,
      addresses, billing information, data requested余 and (iii) any other
      information that identifies an individual as an About Customer.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'information requested' to 'data requested' creates a subtle shift in meaning. Is the broader concept of information more wide-ranging than data? Does ebix need to give different data now? Does the term incorporate additional data sets? This could lead to disputes regarding data sharing obligations.

perturbation.original_text:
13.4 The ebix Insurance Center shall be operational and fully functionally at
least ninety nine percent (99.0%) of the time during the Term, without taking
into account scheduled downtime and maintenance which shall not exceed in the
aggregate, one (1) hour in any one (1) month period. In the event of any
downtime and/or maintenance in excess of the aforementioned amount, such shall
be deemed a material breach and ebix shall have twenty four (24) hours in which
to cure such breach.
perturbation.changed_text:
13.4 The ebix Insurance Center shall be operational and fully functional at
least ninety nine percent (99.0%) of the time during the Term, without taking
into account scheduled downtime and maintenance which shall not exceed in the
aggregate, one (1) hour in any one (1) month period. In the event of any
interruption and/or maintenance in excess of the aforementioned amount, such shall
be deemed a material breach and ebix shall have twenty four (24) hours in which
to cure such breach.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'downtime' to 'interruption' might broaden the scope of what constitutes a breach. 'Downtime' typically refers to a complete outage, while 'interruption' could include slower loading times or intermittent errors. It's unclear if they're intended to mean the same thing, potentially leading to disputes over whether a minor performance issue constitutes a breach of the agreement.
